hero.subheadline: Frontend architecture specialist building production-grade systems with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Focused on Core Web Vitals, SEO, and scalable architectures.

about.title: Engineering-First Mindset
paragraphs: I'm a frontend engineer who thinks in systems, not just screens. At Zolvit (formerly Vakilsearch), I build and maintain high-traffic Next.js applications where every millisecond of performance translates to real business impact.

My approach is rooted in understanding the "why" behind technical decisions. Whether it's choosing between server-side rendering for SEO-critical pages or implementing incremental static regeneration for frequently updated content, I prioritize solutions that scale.
I don't just write code—I build systems that empower non-engineers through CMS-driven architectures, reduce operational overhead, and improve search visibility through technical SEO implementations.

highlights.title: Performance Engineering
highlights.description: Obsessed with Core Web Vitals, JS execution optimization, and delivering sub-second experiences.

highlights.title: Architecture Decisions
highlights.description: SSR vs SSG vs ISR—choosing the right rendering strategy for each use case.

highlights.title: End-to-End Ownership
highlights.description: From technical specs to production deployment, owning the complete development lifecycle.

highlights.title: Cross-Team Collaboration
highlights.description: Working with backend, design, and product teams to ship cohesive solutions.

highlights: Own development of high-traffic Next.js applications serving legal services platform
Lead Core Web Vitals optimization initiatives—JS execution, caching strategies, asset delivery
Architected CMS-driven layouts enabling marketing team to ship pages without engineering
Reduced 3,000+ underperforming pages to zero in Google Search Console through technical SEO fixes
Increased search impressions by 8% within 10 days through structured data and meta optimizations
Built production React & Next.js components for high-traffic legal services pages
Implemented accessibility standards (WCAG) and established shared component library
Integrated RESTful APIs with proper error handling and loading states
Documented components in Storybook, improving developer experience and design handoff
Collaborated with backend and design teams to improve cross-functional workflows

items.institution: St. Peter's Matriculation Higher Secondary School
St. Peter's Matriculation Higher Secondary School

projects.title: Case Studies
projects.description: Real production systems with measurable outcomes. Each project represents a problem solved, not just code written.

items.title: CMS-Based Legal Services Platform
items.problem: Engineering team bottleneck for content updates; slow time-to-market for new pages.
decisions: SSR for SEO-critical pages to maximize crawlability
CMS-driven layouts with API-first content delivery
Component library for consistent UI across dynamically generated pages
items.impact: Reduced engineering dependency for content updates by 80%, enabling marketing team to ship pages independently.

items.title: Video Consultation Web Application
items.problem: Need for real-time legal consultations with reliable, low-latency video.
decisions: WebRTC for peer-to-peer video with fallback TURN servers
WebSocket for signaling and real-time state synchronization
items.impact: Delivered production-ready video consultations with <200ms latency and seamless payment integration.

items.title: Lawyers Listing & Public Q&A Platform
items.problem: Large datasets of lawyers and Q&A content requiring fast search and SEO visibility.
decisions: Server-rendered pages for search engine indexing
Elasticsearch for sub-second search across 100K+ records
items.impact: Achieved 99.9% uptime with <100ms search response times serving high-traffic legal queries.

items.label: Underperforming Pages Fixed
items.description: Reduced poor-performing pages to zero in Google Search Console through systematic technical SEO improvements.

items.label: Search Impressions Increase
items.description: Achieved measurable SEO lift within 10 days through structured data and meta tag optimizations.

items.label: Core Web Vitals Green
items.description: Optimized LCP, FID, and CLS across mobile and desktop for production applications.

items.label: Application Uptime
items.description: Maintained high availability for legal services platform serving thousands of daily users.

footer.title: Let's Build Something Fast
footer.description: I'm always interested in discussing high-performance web systems, frontend architecture, and scalable solutions.
